categories: Category:Battles of the Galactic Civil War

nodes.text: The Battle of Organarms was a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The Imperial Missile Boat Mu 1 destroyed the X7 Factory Organarms.

The Battle of Organarms first appeared in the first Missile Boat combat training mission, "Dual Warheads," of the Defender of the Empire expansion pack of the 1994 computer game Star Wars: TIE Fighter.
